item.description:
As I missed to hike at Wildcat Range in Oct, I'll need to peakbag some of high peaks over there to complete my list.
Wildcat Range has Wildcat Mountain (4422 ft), B peak, C Peak, Wildcat D (4062 ft) and E Peak. 2 of them are NH 4K footers.

After completing this hike successfully, I'll be done 95 out of NE 100 highest. Please join my hike!

We'll need car spotting since this is through-hike.

Car Spotting Plan:

We'll meet at 8AM at the Parking Lot of Nineteen Mile Bk Trail TH on Rt 16 for car spotting.
Everyone come here first. Then, we leave some cars here and drive the rest of cars to the parking lot of Glen Boulder Trail TH on Rt 16.


Hiking Plan:

HIKE-IN
* We'll start hiking no later than 8:20AM.

* 2.0 Miles Reach to E Peak via Wildcat Ridge Tr
* 0.3 Miles Reach to Wildcat D via Wildcat Ridge Tr
* 1.8 Miles Reach to Wildcat Mtn via C Peak, B Peak on Wildcat Ridge Tr

HIKE-OUT
* 0.7 Miles Wildcat Ridge Tr (This is very steep section descent!)
* 3.6 Miles Nineteen Mile Bk Trail to come back to the car spotting loc.

Total hiking mileage is approximately 8.5 miles.
It will take about 6 hours if we keep 1.5 mph hiking pace. If there are a lot of snow on the trails and if we have to break trails, it may take more time to complete the hike, of course.

I'll bring Microspikes for hiking, but, just in case, I'll bring crampons and snowshoes in the car as well.
I'd like to expect hikers who join do trial research before joining my hike and prepare adequate gear for winter hike. I may not allow unprepared hikers to join my hike at the hiking start point.


I'm looking forward to meeting/hiking with you,

Assistant Organizer,
Tomoko Nakajima


As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.
item.how_to_find_us: My Car is Honda CR-V (Blue) w/ VT green plate
item.name: Wildcat Range Hike - Wildcat (4422 ft) & Wildcat D (4062 ft).
